slides.script: I forgot my best friend's birthday...for the 3rd year in a row. The stress of work, family and life was overwhelming my brain. I felt like I was losing my mind.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a stressed woman holding her head in her hands at a desk, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Turns out, I wasn't alone. My sister, my co-workers, even my super-organized mom were all struggling with the same thing - constant, oppressive stress that made us feel scattered and anxious all the time.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic collage of stressed faces - a sister, co-workers in an office, a mom in a kitchen, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: But here's the hidden truth: while we were all struggling, an ancient stress-relief secret was sitting right under our noses. A plant used for centuries in Ayurvedic medicine to calm the mind and body.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of an Ashwagandha plant with a soft glow around it, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: My yoga teacher pulled me aside after class one day. She could see the stress written all over my face. She handed me a little amber bottle and said, "Just trust me on this one.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a wise, serene yoga teacher handing an amber bottle to a stressed student, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: She explained that Ashwagandha, the "strength of ten horses", had been used for over 3000 years to help people feel calm, focused and resilient. Now, modern science was validating what ancient sages always knew.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of an ancient Indian sage in meditation juxtaposed with a modern scientist in a lab, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Day 3: I noticed I wasn't clenching my jaw anymore. Day 7: I slept through the night for the first time in months. Week 2: My mind felt clear and I was tackling my to-do list with ease.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic series of 3 images showing a woman's transformation - jaw unclenched, sleeping peacefully, checking off a to-do list with a smile, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: My skeptical husband was shocked. "Who are you and what have you done with my wife?" he joked. My mom started asking me what my secret was. Even my best friend noticed I seemed more present and relaxed.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a surprised husband, a curious mom, and a happy best friend all looking at the camera with raised eyebrows, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Now, I have the focus to be present with my family, the resilience to handle challenges at work, and the peace of mind to actually enjoy my life. All thanks to one little herb.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a woman looking serene and happy while working at her desk, playing with her kids, and doing yoga, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: It's called Goli Ashwagandha Gummies. Goli took this ancient wisdom and turned it into a delicious, organic, plant-based gummy that makes stress relief easy. Just two gummies a day can help you feel like yourself again.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of Goli Ashwagandha Gummies bottle and two gummies next to an Ashwagandha plant, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Don't wait until stress steals more precious moments. Try Goli Ashwagandha Gummies for yourself and feel the difference that "the strength of ten horses" can make. Your future self will thank you.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a woman smiling peacefully while holding a bottle of Goli Ashwagandha Gummies, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format
